[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Allows you to do Farming related things.

## /farming check_patches

**Usage**

- `/farming check_patches`

**Parameters**

_No parameters._

## /farming plant

**Usage**

- `/farming plant plant_name:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [pay:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `plant_name` | `string` | Yes | The plant you want to plant. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to plant. | - |
| `pay` | `boolean` | No | Pay farmers for protection. | - |

## /farming auto_farm

**Usage**

- `/farming auto_farm`

**Parameters**

_No parameters._

## /farming auto_farm_filter

**Usage**

- `/farming auto_farm_filter auto_farm_filter_data:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `auto_farm_filter_data` | `string` | Yes | The auto farm filter you want to use by default. (default: AllFarm) | - |

## /farming default_compost

**Usage**

- `/farming default_compost compost:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `compost` | `string` | Yes | The compost you want to use by default. | 3 options (see autocomplete) |

## /farming harvest

**Usage**

- `/farming harvest patch_name:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `patch_name` | `string` | Yes | The patches you want to harvest. | - |

## /farming tithe_farm

**Usage**

- `/farming tithe_farm [buy_reward:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `buy_reward` | `string` | No | Buy a Tithe Farm reward. | - |

## /farming compost_bin

**Usage**

- `/farming compost_bin plant_name:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `plant_name` | `string` | Yes | The plant you want to put in the Compost Bins. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to put in. | - |

## /farming contract

**Usage**

- `/farming contract [input:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `input` | `string` | No | The input you want to give. | easy, medium, hard, easier |
